meaning_str.bing:
n. 电话；电话机；（电话机的）受话器
v. 给某人打电话
网络. 联系电话；电话号码；联络电话

电话；电话机；（电话机的）受话器
联系电话；电话号码；联络电话

电话；电话机；电话设备；受话器
打电话给；通过电话联系；用电话通知；电话联络

1.en: The fourth guy leaned against a telephone pole, standing unsteadily, occasionally muttered some words out his mouth and shivered non-stop.
1.cn: 还有一个靠着旁边的电线杆摇摇晃晃地站着，偶尔说些听不懂的话，并且不停地抽搐。

2.en: "China is changing to become remarkably more like the U. S. , " he said by telephone.
2.cn: “中国目前正变得比美国更加地引人注目，”他通过电话解释道。

3.en: The criminals did not know the police were listening in , eg by tapping their telephone.
3.cn: 罪犯不知道他们一直受着警方的监听（如窃听其电话）。

0.en: Did you try calling her on the telephone? The telephone.
0.cn: 你打过她家里电话吗？对呀，打座机。

1.en: You be ferocious! You be relentless! You be telephone terrorists!
1.cn: 你们要凶残，你们要狠心，你们要做电话里的恐怖分子。

2.en: How the hell did you get them up on that telephone wire?
2.cn: 你他娘的怎么把我衣服弄到电话线上去了？

3.en: Have we got any biscuits? No, but we've got a toy telephone. How much will that be?
3.cn: 苏西，我们这里有没有饼干呀？没有，但是我们有一个玩具电话。那这个电话要多少钱呐？

4.en: Suzy, have we got any biscuits? No, but we've got a toy telephone. How much will that be?
4.cn: 苏西，我们这里有没有饼干呀？没有，但是我们有一个玩具电话。那这个电话要多少钱呐？

5.en: A telephone. Peppa, that is the fire phone. It's only to be used when there is a fire. Fire. Fire.
5.cn: 一个电话！佩奇，那个是消防电话，只能有在有火情的时候才能用。啊，着火了！着火了！

6.en: Anyway, I'll telephone the bank in the morning and return your thousand pounds.
6.cn: 总之，我早上会打电话给银行还您的一千镑。

7.en: We certainly have. And this is our next moment. I'll telephone and make an appointment.
7.cn: 那是当然，这会是我们下一个共同经历，我会打电话预约的。

8.en: Not all of them, just the most basic. Television. Telephone. Radio. That's amazing.
8.cn: 不是所有的电磁波，只有最常见的，电视，电话，广播。太厉害了。

9.en: And you're basing all this on a code name? On a whispered voice on the telephone? Come on, Mycroft.
9.cn: 这一切都基于一个代号吗？基于电话里的一个声音吗？得了，麦考夫。

10.en: I'll telephone and suggest we meet for luncheon. Then I'll ask him straight out to dismiss his valet. I won't say why.
10.cn: 我会电话约他吃午餐，我会直接要他开除他的贴身男仆。我不会说为什么。

11.en: And then one day she cornered the man who was installing the telephone here and that's how I got my first job in business.
11.cn: 然后有一天，她堵住来这里装电话的人，我就是那样得到了第一份商业工作。

12.en: What's to know? Buy sell, high low, bears bulls. Yes Manhattan. Yeah telephone number of the stock, selling store.
12.cn: 要通什么？买，卖，高，低，熊市，牛市。喂，曼哈顿麻烦帮我查个电话号码，股票商店。

13.en: Yeah, and it would probably be better than the last telephone job I had. You know, I probably wouldn't have to say spank as much.
13.cn: 他一定比上次我做的电话行销工作还棒，或许我不必常常说“打我屁股吧”。

14.en: And in the case of the telephone, it's up to each and every one of you, my highly trained Strattonites. My killers!
14.cn: 电话也是一样，它们能否发挥作用 掌握在你们每个人手中，我的斯奥投资精英们，我的杀手们。

15.en: A lovely plant, our computer, tinned food, hot water bottles, some winter clothes in case it gets a bit chilly, the telephone.
15.cn: 一盆可爱的植物，我们的电脑，罐装食物，热水瓶。一些厚衣服，以防这里变冷，电话。

16.en: A lovely plant, our computer, tinned food, hot water bottles, some winter clothes in case it gets a bit chilly, the telephone.
16.cn: 一盆可爱的植物，我们的电脑，罐装食物，热水瓶。一些厚衣服，以防这里变冷，电话。

17.en: Dear Mr. Pig, please pay your telephone bill. Oh. What's a bill? It sounds very boring. Bills are very boring.
17.cn: 亲爱的猪先生，请你支付你的电话账单。噢天啊！什么是账单啊？它听上去非常的无聊。账单确实是非常的无聊。

18.en: I am the king of the castle. Every castle needs a telephone. Hold this. Keep this string nice and tight and you can talk to the boys.
18.cn: 我是城堡的国王，每一个城堡都需要一个电话。拿着这个。接下来你们拿紧着绳子，就可以跟男孩们说话了。

19.en: Think of all your friends waiting for you back home. Yes, I miss my friends. And I miss Goldie the fish. Can I telephone Goldie? OK, Peppa.
19.cn: 想想那些等着你回家的朋友。是的，我想念我的朋友。我也想念金鱼金金，我可以打电话给金金吗？好的，佩奇。
